quoteFirst: About 11 p.m. the Brigade gave us information as to the hour and other particulars of the attack, and instructions that we were to assist the attack by a heavy fire demonstration at
quoteLast: against the trenches on our front, and that if the C.O. considered the conditions justified it, we were to push forward and secure F12.
title: The Fifth Battalion Highland Light Infantry in the War 1914-1918
author: Great Britain. Army. Highland Light Infantry. Battalion, 5th

quoteLast: on 16th August, we opened fire along our whole front. The intensity and volume of the enemy's reply were startling. Within a minute rifles and machine-guns were showering a hail of lead on our parapets.
title: The Fifth Battalion Highland Light Infantry in the War 1914-1918
author: Great Britain. Army. Highland Light Infantry. Battalion, 5th
